amendment.description: To include pharmacy services in the study relating to outpatient pharmacy therapy reimbursements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1014 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1014 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Bond. (consideration: CR S8647) To include pharmacy services in the study relating to outpatient pharmacy therapy reimbursements.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1014 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Bond.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1014 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
